  • Constructor Details

    • Lycanthrope

      public Lycanthrope(String name, Gender gender, int height, int age, int strength, int endurance, int health, int hunger, int belligerence, int magicPotionLevel, PersonType personType)
      Creates a new character with all base attributes.
      Parameters:
      name - character's name
      gender - biological gender
      height - height in centimeters
      age - age in years
      strength - physical strength
      endurance - resistance to damage
      health - current health points
      hunger - current hunger level
      belligerence - belligerence level
      magicPotionLevel - current magic potion amount
